resources.string:
Captain! The planet is collapsing! We've been hit! Power is failing and the thrusters are dying! We need to get out of this tunnel fast! 
\> Tap the screen to use the thrusters. 
\> Don't collide with any objects or the edges of the screen. 
\> As you travel you will pick up speed. 
\> There is a way out! Can you make it?
Tap the screen to play again!
